help.text: Placeholder/pass job to allow for arguments injection

expects.name: __args
expects.desc: The args to inject

expects.name: __debug
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate that args to be inject should be printed before

expects.name: __templateArgs
expects.desc: Boolean, true by default, to indicate to apply template to each string in args (use only if typeArgs.noTemplateArgs = false OR job.templateArgs = true)

help.text: Outputs the current args and res values to help debug an ojob flow.

jobs.name: ojob job debug

expects.name: job
expects.desc: The job to change to include debug

expects.name: jobs
expects.desc: The jobs array to change to include debug

expects.name: lineColor
expects.desc: The line color around the debug info

expects.name: textColor
expects.desc: The text color around the debug info

expects.name: theme
expects.desc: The withSideLineThemes theme to use

expects.name: emoticons
expects.desc: If emoticons should be used or not

expects.name: signs
expects.desc: A custom map of emoticons (keys: checkpoint, assert and print)

expects.name: includeTime
expects.desc: A boolean value to indicate if a time indication should be included

help.text: Retrieves a specific map key (or path) using $get

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: Map key to retrieve (key is also checked for compatibility)

expects.name: __path
expects.desc: The path to consider from the __key

help.text: Sets a "key" with the current value on a "path" using $set

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: Map key

expects.name: __path
expects.desc: A key or path to a value from the current args

help.text: Unsets a "key" using $unset

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: Map key

jobs.name: ojob file get

help.text: Retrieves a specific map key (or path) from an YAML or JSON file provided.

expects.name: __file
expects.desc: The file path to an YAML or JSON file

expects.name: __path
expects.desc: Path of the file contents

expects.name: __cache
expects.desc: Boolean value that if false it won't cache the file contents (default: true)

expects.name: __ttl
expects.desc: If cache is enabled lets you define a numeric ttl

expects.name: __out
expects.desc: The path on args to set the map key/path contents

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: If __out is not defined will set the content into the provided key

help.text: Applies the OpenAF template over the provided data producing an output.

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: The key that holds template and/or data (default to 'res'). If 'args' it will use the current arguments.

expects.name: __tpath
expects.desc: The path in __key where a string with the template can be found.

expects.name: __dpath
expects.desc: The path in __key where a map/array data to use can be found.

expects.name: __out
expects.desc: The output will be stored into the provided key (defaults to 'res')

expects.name: __outPath
expects.desc: If defined the $set path where __out will be set in the provided key.

expects.name: template
expects.desc: If defined, will be used as template

expects.name: templateFile
expects.desc: If defined, it will use the provided template file.

expects.name: data
expects.desc: If defined, will be used as data

expects.name: dataFile
expects.desc: If defined, it will use the provided data file (either yaml or json).

expects.name: outputFile
expects.desc: If defined, the output will be written to the provided file path.

returns.name: output
returns.desc: If no outputFile is provided this will hold the output of applying the template with the provided data

help.text: Given a templateFolder it will execute 'ojob template' for each (recursively), with the provided data, to output to outputFolder. Optionally metaTemplate can be use where each json/yaml file in templateFolder all or part of the arguments for 'ojob template'.

expects.name: templateFolder
expects.desc: The original folder where the templates are located.

expects.name: __templatePath
expects.desc: If defined, will apply a $path string over the recursive list of files in templateFolder.

expects.name: outputFolder
expects.desc: The path where the output should be stored.

expects.name: data
expects.desc: If defined, will be used as data

expects.name: dataFile
expects.desc: If defined, it will use the provided data file (either yaml or json).

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: The key that holds template and/or data (default to 'res'). If 'args' it will use the current arguments.

expects.name: __dpath
expects.desc: The path in __key where a map/array data to use can be found.

expects.name: logJob
expects.desc: A ojob job to log the 'ojob template' activity (receives the same arguments as 'ojob template')

expects.name: metaTemplate
expects.desc: Boolean that if 'true' will interpret any json/yaml file, in the templateFolder, as a map/array of arguments to use when calling 'ojob template' overriden the defaults.

help.text: Performs an in-memory find/replace on a provided string or file and outputs to args.output or, optionally, to a file.

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: The key that holds template and/or data (default to 'res'). If 'args' it will use the current arguments.

expects.name: __path
expects.desc: The path in __key where a map of replacements ([text/regexp]:[replace text]) can be found.

expects.name: inputKey
expects.desc: If defined, indicates the key that holds the string of data to replace.

expects.name: inputPath
expects.desc: If defined with inputKey, indicates the path to use to select the string of data to replace.

expects.name: inputFile
expects.desc: If defined the contents to be replaced will be read from the inputFile.

expects.name: outputFile
expects.desc: If defined will output of the content replacement to the defined file.

expects.name: useRegExp
expects.desc: Boolean value to determine if the map of replacements will be interpreted as a regexp or text.

expects.name: flagsRegExp
expects.desc: If useRegExp=true the JavaScript reg exp flags to use (defaults to 'g')

expects.name: logJob
expects.desc: Optionally provide a logging job with the current args and __op with 'read' or 'write'

returns.name: output
returns.desc: If outputFile is not defined the output will contain the content replacement

typeArgs.text: Provides a set of operations over an OpenAF channel

expects.name: __name
expects.desc: The name of the OpenAF channel to use

expects.name: __op
expects.desc: The operation to perform (e.g. setall, set, get, unset, unsetall, getkeys, getall and size)

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: The key from where to retrieve the operation arguments (args to retrive from arguments)

expects.name: __kpath
expects.desc: If defined, the path over the values retrieved from __key where the key or keys of the operation are defined

expects.name: key
expects.desc: If defined, the key to use with the operations set, get and unset

expects.name: keys
expects.desc: If defined, the set of fields to use with the operations setall and unsetall

expects.name: value
expects.desc: If defined, the value to use with the operations set, get and unset

expects.name: values
expects.desc: If defined, an array of values to use with the operations setall and unsetall

expects.name: __vpath
expects.desc: If defined, the path over the values retrieved from __key where the value or values of the operation are defined

expects.name: extra
expects.desc: If defined, will provide an extra argument (usually a map), depending on channel type, for the getall and getkeys operations.

returns.name: _list
returns.desc: If __key == 'args' will return the results of getall and getkeys

returns.name: _map
returns.desc: If __key == 'args' will return the results of get

returns.name: size
returns.desc: If __key == 'args' will return the size of the channel

help.text: Prints a message line given an OpenAF template

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: Map key to retrieve ('args' for arguments)

expects.name: __path
expects.desc: The path to consider from the __key

expects.name: msg
expects.desc: The message template to use

expects.name: level
expects.desc: The level of the message (info (default) or error)

help.text: Parses an input text as simple ascii markdown

expects.name: __text
expects.desc: The text template to parse.

help.text: Logs a message line given an OpenAF template

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: Map key to retrieve ('args' for arguments)

expects.name: __path
expects.desc: The path to consider from the __key

expects.name: msg
expects.desc: The message template to use

expects.name: level
expects.desc: The level of the message (info (default), warn or error)

expects.name: options
expects.desc: Extra options to provide to the tlog* functions. See more in the help of tlog, tlogErr and tlogWarn.

help.text:
Executes the provided function mapping any args to the function arguments using the odoc help available for the provided function.
Note: accessing odoc might be slow on a first execution.

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: The key string to retrieve previous results (defaults to 'res')

expects.name: __fn
expects.desc: The function to execute

expects.name: __path
expects.desc: If defined the args path for the function arguments to consider

expects.name: __fnPath
expects.desc: If defined the args path where to set the function result

jobs.name: ojob output

help.text: Prints the current arguments to the console.

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: The key string to retrieve previous results (defaults to 'res'). If "args" will retrieve from current args.

expects.name: __path
expects.desc: A path string to a map/array over the results set on key.

expects.name: __format
expects.desc: The output format (e.g. see ow.oJob.output help)

expects.name: __title
expects.desc: Encapsulates the output map/array with a title key.

expects.name: __internal
expects.desc: Boolean value that if true it will display the internal oJob entries on the arguments (default false)

expects.name: __function
expects.desc: One of the OpenAF's print or log functions available

help.text: Outputs a jobs report (e.g. job name, status, number of executions, total time, avg time and last execution) upon ojob termination

expects.name: __format
expects.desc: Can be json, yaml, table (default) or any other ow.oJob.output format

help.text: Outputs a tree list for each defined job (excluding "ojob *") and a comma delimited list of dependencies with a status flag
Outputs a tree list for each defined job (excluding "ojob *") and a comma delimited list of dependencies with a status flag

jobs.name: ojob report

help.text: Outputs a jobs report (e.g. job name, status, number of executions, total time, avg time and last execution)

expects.name: __format
expects.desc: Can be json, yaml, table (default) or any other ow.oJob.output format

jobs.exec:

jobs.name: ojob options

help.text:
Adds new "todo" entries depending on the value of a provided args variable.

Example:

  __optionOn : mode
  __lowerCase: true
  __todos    :
    mode1:
    - Job 1
    - Job 2
    mode2:
    - Job 2
    - Job 3
  __default:
  - Job 2

expects.name: __optionOn
expects.desc: The variable in args that will define which set of "todo"s will be added (trimmed)

expects.name: __lowerCase
expects.desc: Boolean value to determine if should compare the optionOn in lower case (defaults to false)

expects.name: __upperCase
expects.desc: Boolean value to determine if should compare the optionOn in upper case (defaults to false)

expects.name: __todos
expects.desc: Map where each option value should have a list/array of "todo"s

expects.name: __default
expects.desc: Default array of "todo"s

expects.name: __async
expects.desc: Boolean value that if true, run the todos in async mode

jobs.name: ojob sec get

help.text: This job will get a SBucket secret and map it to oJob's args

expects.name: secIn
expects.desc: The args path where all the remaining sec arguments should be read from (defaults to no path)

expects.name: [secIn].secOut
expects.desc: The args path to be mapped with the secret (defaults to secIn)

expects.name: [secIn].secKey
expects.desc: The SBucket key

expects.name: [secIn].secRepo
expects.desc: The SBucket repository

expects.name: [secIn].secBucket
expects.desc: The SBucket name

expects.name: [secIn].secPass
expects.desc: The SBucket password

expects.name: [secIn].secMainPass
expects.desc: The SBucket repository password

expects.name: [secIn].secFile
expects.desc: Optional provide a specific sbucket file

expects.name: [secIn].secDontAsk
expects.desc: Determine if passwords should be asked from the user (default=false)

expects.name: [secIn].secEnv
expects.desc: If true will set everything to retrieve the secret from an env variable

expects.name: [secIn].secIgnore
expects.desc: If true will ignore errors of sec parameters not being provided (default=false)

returns.name: [secIn].[secOut]
returns.desc: The args path to be mapped with the secret (defaults to secIn)

help.text:
Splits an args source into an array of maps (_list).

Example:

  a source string with the value "abc, xyz, 1"
  + separator = ','
  transforms into:

  - item: abc
  - item: xyz
  - item: 1

expects.name: source
expects.desc: A object path to the string source to split

expects.name: separator
expects.desc: The separator for the source string (defaults to \n)

help.text: Performs a query (using ow.obj.filter) to the existing args.

expects.name: __query
expects.desc: The query map for ow.obj.filter or af.fromNLinq

expects.name: __type
expects.desc: The type of query to perform (e.g. path, ow.obj.filter, af.fromNLinq)

expects.name: __from
expects.desc: The path to the args key to perform the query

expects.name: __to
expects.desc: The path to where the results should be stores

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: If __from and __to not provided defaults to $get/$set on the provided key

help.text: Sets job args based on environment variables.

expects.name: envs
expects.desc: A map where each key corresponds to an environment variable and the value to the args path where it should be placed

jobs.name: ojob if

help.text: If the provided "condition" is evaluated as true it will execute the "then" jobs otherwise it will execute the "else" jobs

expects.name: __condition
expects.desc: An OpenAF code condition with templating functionality (example: "{{abc}} == 123")

expects.name: __then
expects.desc: One job or a list of jobs to execute if the "condition" is true

expects.name: __else
expects.desc: One job or a list of jobs to execute if the "condition" is false

expects.name: __debug
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate if should log the original condition and the parsed condition for debug proposes

jobs.exec:
isString(args.__then)&&(args.__then=[args.__then]);isString(args.__else)&&(args.__else=[args.__else]);var a=String(args.__condition);delete args.__condition;var e=clone(args.__then);delete args.__then;var f=clone(args.__else);delete args.__else;var d=!!args.__debug;delete args.__debug;var b=templify(a,args).replace(/\n/g,"");d&&log(" DEBUG | "+af.toSLON({origCondition:" "+a+" ",parsedCondition:" "+b+" "}));b=af.eval(b);d&&log(" DEBUG | "+af.toSLON({origCondition:" "+a+" ",result:b}));
a=function(c){c=ow.oJob.parseTodo(c);$job(c,args)};b?e.forEach(a):f.forEach(a)

jobs.name: ojob repeat

help.text: Repeats sequentially, for a specific number of "times", the provided list of "jobs" (one or more)

expects.name: __times
expects.desc: The number of times to repeat the provided list of jobs

expects.name: __jobs
expects.desc: One job or a list of jobs to execute each time

jobs.exec: if(!isString(args.__jobs)&&!isArray(args.__jobs))throw"The provided 'jobs' need to be one or a list of jobs.";if(isUnDef(args.__jobs))throw"No 'jobs' list was provided.";isString(args.__jobs)&&(args.__jobs=[args.__jobs]);var c=clone(args.__jobs);delete args.__jobs;var d=Number(args.__times);delete args.__times;var a=clone(args);delete a.__jobs;delete a.__time;for(var b=0;b<d;b++)$job("ojob todo",merge(a,{todo:c}))

jobs.name: ojob repeat with each

help.text: Repeats the configured "jobs" (one or more jobs) sequentially for each element of the provided "key" list.

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: The key for an existing list or args

expects.name: __path
expects.desc: The path to consider from __key

expects.name: __jobs
expects.desc: One job or a list of jobs to execute each time

ow.oJob.parseTodo(c);$job(c,merge(args,e))})})

jobs.name: ojob job

help.text:
Provides a way to organize idempotent jobs. One or more "checks" jobs will be called to determine an args._action.
Initially the args._action is set to "none". If the "checks" jobs determine an action it will call the corresponding
jobs on "actions" jobs. If "_go=true" is not provided, instead of running, it will only return a plan of actions. 
For example:

  - name: Write Hello World
    to  : ojob job
    args:
      _checks : Check Hello World
      _actions:
        create   : Create Hello World
        overwrite: Overwrite Hello World
        delete   : Delete Hello World

expects.name: _checks
expects.desc: A list of one or more jobs to be called to perform checks to determine an args._action

expects.name: _actions
expects.desc: A map of possible values of args._action whose values are one or more jobs to execute

expects.name: _go
expects.desc: A boolean value (defaults to false) that controls if the _actions jobs are called (when true) or not

jobs.exec:
isString(args._checks)&&(args._checks=[args._checks]);isString(args._actions)&&(args._actions={none:args._actions});var c=function(a){a=clone(a);delete a._checks;delete a._actions;return a};args._action="none";args._checks.forEach(function(a){isString(a)?(a=$job(a,c(args)),isMap(a)&&isString(a._action)&&(args._action=a._action)):logErr("oJob Job 'checks' must be job names")});$ch("_ojob_plan").create();$ch("_ojob_plan").get({name:job.name});var d=[];if(isDef(args._actions[args._action])){var b;
isArray(args._actions[args._action])&&(b=args._actions[args._action]);isString(args._actions[args._action])&&(b=[args._actions[args._action]]);b.forEach(function(a){args._go?$job(a,c(args)):d.push(a)})}$ch("_ojob_plan").set({name:job.name},{name:job.name,action:args._action,"go?":args._go,plan:d})

help.text: Outputs a job jobs report (e.g. job name, action and plan)

expects.name: __format
expects.desc: Can be json, yaml, table (default) or any other ow.oJob.output format

help.text: Outputs a job jobs report (e.g. job name, action and plan) upon ojob termination

expects.name: __format
expects.desc: Can be json, yaml, table (default) or any other ow.oJob.output format

help.text: Changes the current state.

expects.name: __state
expects.desc: The state to change to (to execute todo.when)

help.text: Gets the current state into args.state.

Changes the current state depending on the value of a provided args variable.

  Example:

    stateOn  : mode
    lowerCase: true
    default  : Help

expects.name: stateOn
expects.desc: The variable in args that will define the current global set (to execute todo.when)

expects.name: lowerCase
expects.desc: A boolean value to determine if should compare the stateOn in lower case (defaults to false)

expects.name: upperCase
expects.desc: A boolean value to determine if should compare the stateOn in upper case (defaults to false)

expects.name: validStates
expects.desc: An array of valid states to change to. If not included the default will be choosen (or none).

expects.name: default
expects.desc: Default value of state

jobs.name: ojob todo

help.text:
Executes an ojob sub-todo.
NOTE: doesn't perform any checks for recursive behaviour!

expects.name: todo
expects.desc: A string or array of todo' maps

expects.name: todo[].name
expects.desc: Name of the job to execute

expects.name: todo[].args
expects.desc: Arguments to merge (if isolateArgs is not true) with the main job arguments

expects.name: todo[].isolateArgs
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate, for a specific todo, that args should be isolated from all others

expects.name: todo[].isolateJob
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate, for a specific todo, that the job should run in a different scope (e.g. deps will not work)

expects.name: todo[].templateArgs
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate, for a specific todo, to apply template to each string of the provided args (use only if typeArgs.noTemplateArgs = false OR job.templateArgs = true)

expects.name: isolateArgs
expects.desc: Boolean, false by default, to indicate that args should be isolated from all others

expects.name: isolateJob
expects.desc: Boolean, false by default, to indicate that the job should run in a different scope (e.g. deps will not work)

expects.name: templateArgs
expects.desc: Boolean, true by default, to indicate to apply template to each string of the provided args (use only if typeArgs.noTemplateArgs = false OR job.templateArgs = true)

expects.name: shareArgs
expects.desc: Boolean, false by default, to indicate that args should be shared between all todo's jobs sequentially.

expects.name: __debug
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate that each job execution parameters should be printed before executing

jobs.exec:
if(!isString(args.todo)&&!isArray(args.todo))throw"todo needs to be a string or an array";isString(args.todo)&&(args.todo=[args.todo]);var a=clone(args);delete a.todo;delete a.isolateArgs;delete a.templateArgs;delete a.shareArgs;delete a.__debug;args.todo.forEach(function(b){if(!isMap(b)&&!isString(b))throw"todo entry needs to be a map or a string ("+af.toSLON(b)+")";b=$job("ojob run",{job:b,id:ow.oJob.__id,isolateArgs:args.isolateArgs,isolateJob:args.isolateJob,templateArgs:args.templateArgs,
__debug:args.__debug,args:a});args.shareArgs&&(a=merge(a,b))})

jobs.name: ojob run

help.text: Executes an ojob but alternatively use 'ojob todo' or $job for most functionality.

expects.name: job
expects.desc: Name of the job to execute

expects.name: id
expects.desc: The oJob id to execute (leave undefined to default to the current one)

expects.name: args
expects.desc: The args to consider on execution.

expects.name: isolateArgs
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate that args should be isolated.

expects.name: isolateJob
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate that the job should run in a different scope (e.g. deps will not work)

expects.name: templateArgs
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate to apply template to each string of the provided args (use only if typeArgs.noTemplateArgs = false OR job.templateArgs = true)

expects.name: __debug
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate that each job execution parameters should be printed before executing

help.text: Executes an external YAML/JSON ojob file or a remote URL with the provided args.

expects.name: __job
expects.desc: The YAML/JSON ojob file or remote URL to run

expects.name: __args
expects.desc: The args to provide to the external ojob file/url

expects.name: __out
expects.desc: The path on args to set the map key/path contents

expects.name: __key
expects.desc: If __out is not defined will set the content into the provided key

expects.name: __inKey
expects.desc: If defined, args will be merged with the content from the provided key

expects.name: __usePM
expects.desc: Output to __pm

expects.name: __inPM
expects.desc: Input from provided key to __pm

expects.name: __templateArgs
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate to apply template to each string of the provided args (use only if typeArgs.noTemplateArgs = false OR job.templateArgs = true)

expects.name: __debug
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate that the job execution parameters should be printed before executing

jobs.name: ojob parallel

help.text:
Executes an ojob sub-todo in parallel.
NOTE: doesn't perform any checks for recursive behaviour!

expects.name: todo
expects.desc: A string or array of todo' maps

expects.name: todo[].name
expects.desc: Name of the job to execute

expects.name: todo[].args
expects.desc: Arguments to merge (if isolateArgs is not true) with the main job arguments

expects.name: todo[].isolateArgs
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate, for a specific todo, that args should be isolated from all others

expects.name: todo[].isolateJob
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate, for a specific todo, that the job should run in a different scope (e.g. deps will not work)

expects.name: todo[].templateArgs
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate, for a specific todo, to apply template to each string of the provided args (use only if typeArgs.noTemplateArgs = false OR job.templateArgs = true)

expects.name: isolateArgs
expects.desc: Boolean, false by default, to indicate that args should be isolated from all others

expects.name: isolateJob
expects.desc: Boolean, false by default, to indicate that the job should run in a different scope (e.g. deps will not work)

expects.name: templateArgs
expects.desc: Boolean, true by default, to indicate to apply template to each string of the provided args (use only if typeArgs.noTemplateArgs = false OR job.templateArgs = true)

expects.name: shareArgs
expects.desc: Boolean, false by default, to indicate that args should be shared between all todo's jobs sequentially.

expects.name: __debug
expects.desc: Boolean to indicate that each job execution parameters should be printed before executing

jobs.exec:
if(!isString(args.todo)&&!isArray(args.todo))throw"todo needs to be a string or an array";isString(args.todo)&&(args.todo=[args.todo]);var a=clone(args),c=[];delete a.todo;delete a.isolateArgs;delete a.templateArgs;delete a.shareArgs;delete a.__debug;args.todo.forEach(function(b){if(!isMap(b)&&!isString(b))throw"todo entry needs to be a map or a string ("+af.toSLON(b)+")";c.push($do(function(){return $job("ojob run",{job:b,id:ow.oJob.__id,isolateArgs:args.isolateArgs,isolateJob:args.isolateJob,
templateArgs:args.templateArgs,__debug:args.__debug,args:a})}))});$doWait($doAll(c))

help.text: Waits for a specific amount of time

expects.name: time
expects.desc: The amount of time, in ms, to pause execution

help.text: Ends all processing with an exit code

expects.name: code
expects.desc: The exit code number to use

expects.name: force
expects.desc: A boolean indicating if instead of exit the processing should halt
